heroes.name: Stormbearer
heroes.backstory: A warrior from a forgotten neon realm, wields a hammer forged from a fallen star.

attacks.super_power: Calls down a neon storm that engulfs the screen.

heroes.backstory: Genius hacker-engineer wearing a neon-powered exo-suit.

attacks.super_power: Full armor overdrive—fires massive chest cannon beam.

heroes.name: Webshade

attacks.special: Pull enemy with neon web & slam.
attacks.super_power: Covers the battlefield in glowing webs, immobilizing all enemies.

heroes.name: Hellrider

attacks.long_attack: Lasso of neon-light, pulls enemies in.
attacks.super_power: Summons neon goddess aura, boosts strength + heals allies.

heroes.name: Solaris
heroes.backstory: Alien hero drawing power from neon solar energy.

attacks.super_power: Goes “Neon Supernova” mode, boosting speed + damage.

attacks.super_power: Summons cyber-panther spirit to fight alongside her.

heroes.name: Titaness

attacks.super_power: Berserk neon mode—unlimited combo power for a short time.
